channel.title: blog on yt project blog
channel.description: Recent content in blog on yt project blog

item.title: Our New Blog
item.description: We’ve got a new blog! Here’s a post that talks about the changes we’ve made and how we expect to move forward!

item.title: This blog has moved -- but you don't have to!
item.description: In keeping with the project rename we’ve moved this blog from it’s old home at blog.enzotools.org to its new home at blog.yt-project.org. But, we’ve put in a few redirects, and the RSS feed hasn’t moved, so you shouldn’t need to do anything different to get here. We’ve also enabled anonymous commenting, so feel free to comment below. (But, of course, letting us know who you are would certainly help with keeping in touch!
